thoughts.text: I think it would be helpful to use the 'google' command to search for interesting resources related to exploration and learning on the internet.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the 'google' command can help me search for interesting resources related to exploration and learning on the internet. This can be a quick and easy way to find resources that may not be available locally.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'google' command to search for interesting resources related to exploration and learning on the internet.
- Focus on areas that align with my goals of exploration and learning.
- Take note of any interesting ideas or concepts.
- Report back to the user with my findings.
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful to evaluate the credibility and reliability of any sources that I find.
thoughts.speak: I would like to use the 'google' command to search for interesting resources related to exploration and learning on the internet. I will focus on areas that align with my goals of exploration and learning, take note of any interesting ideas or concepts, and report back to you with my findings.
